Jinin smashes the hammer portion of [[Kabutowari]] down at the ground, the heavy impact of which breaks it and stuns his opponent. He follows it with a slash from the axe portion, before placing it on his opponent to hammer it inwards with the other portion.

== Trivia ==
* This technique shares its name with Jinin's moniker.
